summary: Utility module that defines data structures and helper functions for managing batched alignments, hypotheses, joint network outputs, and N‑best lists during RNNT (Recurrent Neural Network Transducer) decoding in speech recognition pipelines.
business_intent: Enable high‑performance, batch‑aware RNNT inference and beam‑search decoding for automatic speech‑to‑text systems, providing mechanisms for hypothesis tracking, confidence scoring, and prefix handling.
